title: Internet Wala Love
overview: Jai, a famous RJ lives his life on social media and is an open book, chapter and verse. Aadhya on the contrary is a complete misfit in a world dominated with the internet. She is averse to the idea of social media taking over the lives of people.Jai and Aadhya's life changes when destiny brings them together via the internet which plays cupid time and again to make them fall in love.
